nodes.text: The Hindasar system was a star system in the Expansion Region.

Hindasar became a temporary hiding place for the notorious Doctor Cornelius Evazan after he escaped a prison on Delrian. During his stay in the system, Evazan obtained a forged medical license and set up a medical practice as a cover for his grotesque activities. The victims of his surgeries later banded together to post a bounty on his head.
Hindasar is one the "twelve systems" where Dr. Evazan has a death sentence, as he mentions to Luke Skywalker in Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina.
In The Essential Guide to Characters, it is spelled Hindsaar.
